error.message: [Medium][Cross Site] STANDARD 4.1.1 content_tag does not escape double quotes in attribute values (CVE-2016-6316). Upgrade to 4.2.7.1 https://groups.google.com/d/msg/security-ann/8B2iV2tPRSE/JkjCJkSoCgAJ

[Medium][Denial of Service] STANDARD 4.1.1 is vulnerable to denial of service via mime type caching (CVE-2016-0751). Upgrade to Rails version 4.1.14.1 https://groups.google.com/d/msg/security/9oLY_FCzvoc/w9oI9XxbFQAJ
[Medium][Denial of Service] OLD STANDARD 3.5.1 is XML parsing (CVE-2015-3227). Upgrade to to latest version 5.14 https://groups.google.com/d/msg/new-security/bahr2JLnxvk/x4EocXnHPp8J
